summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1997 KEYSTONE SPRINTER.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE APPROXIMATELY TEN MONTHS AGO, BUT HE LOST THE LETTER.  HE FOUND THE LETTER AND CALLED DOMETIC, BUT WAS INFORMED THAT HE NEEDED A NEW REFRIGERATOR.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE COOLANT WAS LEAKING AS STATED IN THE RECALL.  THE KEYSTONE SPRINTER IS A PULL BEHIND TRAILER; THEREFORE, THERE WAS NO VIN OR FAILURE MILEAGE.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED.  THE RECALL NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN.
